Articles.Content:
Hey crew,

I am sure this has come up before. Apologies in advance if I missed a recent thread about this, but I think it would be nice to have a mod that lets you toggle the autostruts on wheels and landing gear.

The forced autostrutting on those parts can sometimes have undesirable side-effects, as many KSP engineers must have realized.

What do you guys think about this? Is it feasible at all?

Thanks for reading

Daf

There WAS a Module Manager patch to enable this. It doesn't work any more.

I spoke to someone who would know (and I can't remember who), and they said the ability to turn them off had been removed completely. Whether that was from the public API or the private code, I don't recall.

Yes, I agree with you, 100%. I'm still living in dread of the day when I dock some craft and they catastrophically disassemble due to the Heaviest struts shifting targets. That, and designing rovers with body-flex and suspensions was fun.
